pages.text: When seasons is enabled, some animals will take a lot longer to grow to maturity.

Pigs: 6 season months to mature. $(br)Sheep: 1 season year to mature. $(br)Cows: 2 season years to mature. $(br)Chickens: 5 season months to mature. $(br)Horses: 2 season years to mature. $(br)Goats: 3 season years to mature.
